thread.title: Photos: Sofia Hayat Got Swastikas Tattooed On Her Feet & Got Royally Slammed For It
thread.title_full: Photos: Sofia Hayat Got Swastikas Tattooed On Her Feet & Got Royally Slammed For It

author: Divya Rao
title: Photos: Sofia Hayat Got Swastikas Tattooed On Her Feet & Got Royally Slammed For It
text:
Divya Rao Feb . 21 . 2017 Sofia Hayat 
Sofia Hayat has been in the news for her religious antics – be it her adopting the life of a nun or claiming that she’s God’s special child. She has been sharing multiple photos and videos on her Instagram of her ‘new’ life and often receives a lot of flak for it. 
In a new turn of events, Sofia got herself Swastika tattoos on each feet and shared it on Instagram. A post shared by Sofia Hayat. (Gaia Mother) (@sofiahayat) on Feb 18, 2017 at 3:47am PST 
This didn’t go down too well with her followers and people accused her of hurting Hindu sentiments by disrespecting something so sacred. @sofiahayat Dumb actress don't mix Hinduism,Buddhism tey r seperated enlight yorself wid Buddha & His Dhamma.&Riddles of Hinduism – Ambedkar 
— Milind Sahare (@sahare_milind) February 21, 2017 @sofiahayat do u think u did right things? U r insulting a particular religion. U r cheap, always looking for cheap publicity.
